name: Ron Swanson Quotes
author: Maplespace Inc.

sections.description:
As developers, we need regular doses of humour while we manage client WordPress sites. May Ron Swanson Quotes plugin give you some of that today. Source API created by jamesseanwright.

The features:

  • Displays Ron Swanson quotes on your WordPress admin dashboard.
  • You’re welcome.

Data Notes: This plugin reaches out to the publicly available API created by jamesseanwright called ron-swanson-quotes, and the source code can be found here. Note that this API does not currently reside under a license of any kind.

Legal Note: The Ron Swanson character is the sole property of NBC and Like Button Software makes no claim to it.

Special Thanks

API is created and maintained by jamesseanwright – check out their project GitHub page here: https://github.com/jamesseanwright/ron-swanson-quotes
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Updated for the latest version of WordPress. You thought we forgot about this plugin didn’t you?

1.0.0

Release Date – 15 February 2019

  • Welcome to the world.
